25  typedef struct ClockDataRecord {
26  double bias, sig_bias;
27  double drift, sig_drift;
28  double accel, sig_accel;
29  } ClockRecord;
30 
32  std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const ClockRecord& rec) throw();
33 
34  // This is a helper for SWIG processing - it needs a template instation of the
35  // base type of ClockSatStore before it is used, so this statement must be between
36  // the ClockDataRecord and ClockSatStore declarations.
37  #ifdef SWIG
38  %template(TabularSatStore_ClockRecord) gpstk::TabularSatStore<gpstk::ClockRecord>;
39  #endif
40 
54  class ClockSatStore : public TabularSatStore<ClockRecord>
55  {
56 
57  // member data
58  protected:
59 
60  // NB haveClockBias and haveClockDrift are in TabularSatStore
62  bool haveClockAccel;
63 
65  int interpType;
66 
69  unsigned int interpOrder;
70 
72  unsigned int Nhalf;
73 
75  bool rejectBadClockFlag;
76 
77  // member functions
78  public:
79 
81  ClockSatStore() throw() : haveClockAccel(false),
82  interpType(2), Nhalf(5),
83  rejectBadClockFlag(true)
84  {
85  // NB. if interpType = 1, interpOrder = 2 (linear)
86  interpOrder = 2*Nhalf;
87  haveClockBias = true;
88  haveClockDrift = havePosition = haveVelocity = false;
89  }
90 
92  virtual ~ClockSatStore() {};
93 
95  bool hasClockAccel() const throw() { return haveClockAccel; }
96 
106  virtual ClockRecord getValue(const SatID& sat, const CommonTime& ttag)
107  const throw(InvalidRequest);
108 
117  double getClockBias(const SatID& sat, const CommonTime& ttag)
118  const throw(InvalidRequest);
119 
129  double getClockDrift(const SatID& sat, const CommonTime& ttag)
130  const throw(InvalidRequest);
131 
139  virtual void dump(std::ostream& os = std::cout, int detail = 0) const throw()
140  {
141  os << "Dump of ClockSatStore(" << detail << "):\n";
142  os << " This store " << (haveClockAccel ? "contains":" does not contain")
143  << " clock acceleration data." << std::endl;
144  os << " Interpolation is ";
145  if(interpType == 2) os << "Lagrange, of order " << interpOrder
146  << " (" << Nhalf << " points on each side)" << std::endl;
147  else os << "Linear." << std::endl;
148  TabularSatStore<ClockRecord>::dump(os,detail);
149  os << "End dump of ClockSatStore.\n";
150  }
151 
158  void addClockRecord(const SatID& sat, const CommonTime& ttag,
159  const ClockRecord& rec)
160  throw(InvalidRequest);
161 
163  void addClockBias(const SatID& sat, const CommonTime& ttag,
164  const double& bias, const double& sig=0.0)
165  throw(InvalidRequest);
166 
168  void addClockDrift(const SatID& sat, const CommonTime& ttag,
169  const double& drift, const double& sig=0.0)
170  throw(InvalidRequest);
171 
173  void addClockAcceleration(const SatID& sat, const CommonTime& ttag,
174  const double& accel, const double& sig=0.0)
175  throw(InvalidRequest);
176 
178  unsigned int getInterpolationOrder(void) throw()
179  { return interpOrder; }
180 
182  void setInterpolationOrder(unsigned int order) throw()
183  {
184  if(interpType == 2) Nhalf = (order+1)/2;
185  else Nhalf = 1;
186  interpOrder = 2*Nhalf;
187  }
188 
191  void rejectBadClocks(const bool flag)
192  { rejectBadClockFlag = flag; }
193 
195  void setLagrangeInterp(void) throw()
196  { interpType = 2; setInterpolationOrder(10); }
197 
199  void setLinearInterp(void) throw()
200  { interpType = 1; setInterpolationOrder(2); }
201 
202  }; // end class ClockSatStore
